code.value:
import requests
from langflow import CustomComponent
from langchain.llms.base import BaseLLM
from langchain.schema import Document
from langchain.document_loaders import YoutubeLoader

# Example usage:

class YourComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name: str = "YouTube Transcriber"
    description: str = "Converts spoken content on YouTube into text."

    def build_config(self):
        return {"url": {"multiline": True, "required": True}}

    def build(self, llm: BaseLLM, url: str="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f39BOur1Is0") -> Document:
        response = requests.get(url)
        loader = YoutubeLoader.from_youtube_url(url, add_video_info=True)
        result = loader.load()
        self.repr_value = str(result)
        return result
code.name: code
